cf item 105

question.question: Which of the following is a characteristic that distinguishes an epileptic seizure from a non-epileptic (pseudo-seizure) event?
question.option_a: Presence of abnormal brain waves on an EEG during the event
question.option_b: Sudden onset and loss of consciousness
